name: 劳埃德·高夫 Lloyd Gough
intro: Lloyd Gough was born on September 21, 1907 in New York City, New York, USA. He was an actor, known for Sunset Blvd. (1950), All My Sons (1948) and The Green Hornet (1966). He was married to Karen Morley and Mildred Munson. He died on July 23, 1984 in Los Angeles, California, USA.
